name: pm5.32rd
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3

stmt.origin: 3bitr4g(w0, wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w2), wa(w2, w1), wa(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wa(w2, w1), wa(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w2, w1))
-| wb(wa(w3, w2), wa(w2, w3))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wb(wa(w2, w1), wa(w2, w3)))
-| wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w2, w1))
-| wb(wa(w3, w2), wa(w2, w3))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w2, w1), wa(w2, w3)))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wb(w1, w3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w2)))
-| wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w2, w1))
-| wb(wa(w3, w2), wa(w2, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wb(w1, w3)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w2)))
-| wb(wa(w3, w2), wa(w2, w3))
-| wi(w0, wi(w2, wb(w1, w3)))

|- wi(w0, wb(wa(w1, w2), wa(w3, w2)))

comment: Distribution of implication over biconditional (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 25-Dec-2004.)
